Package com.rift.coad.util.connection

Interface Summary
Connection This object defines the connection interface that will be used to manage a connection to a object.
 

Class Summary
ConnectionHandler This object is responsible for controlling the Proxy wrapping of any RMI classes in the connection manager.
ConnectionManager This object is responsible for managing the connections to various JNDI bound objects.
ProxyConnection This class manages a proxy connection.
RMIConnection This object controls the RMI based connection.
 

Exception Summary
ConnectionException This exception will get thrown when there is an error while accessing a connection.
NameNotFound The name being looked up does not exist.
